attributes.action: Bring In Real Laws To Reduce And Limit Light Polution (Including Street Lights)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the government to bring in laws and to enforce them to limit and reduce all forms of light pollution and light tresspass.  This should include Street Lights, Flood Lights, Security Lights, and all other forms of light pollution.

While it is recognised that lighting is in many cases neccessary and desirable, ALL lighting should be done in a reasonable, thoughtful, and non-intrusive way.
